  • Constructor Details

    • Directory

      public Directory(Path path, LocalDateTime modified, List<DirCacheTree.Node> children)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      path - The path represented by this Node.
      modified - The modified timestamp.
      children - The children of the Directory - in the order returned by FileWalker (which will be dirs first, then probably sorted by name).

  • Method Details

    • getType

      public FileTree.NodeType getType()
      Get the discriminator to aid in polymorphic deserialization. Always returns NodeType.dir.
      Specified by:
      getType in interface FileTree.FileTreeNode
      Returns:
      NodeType.dir.

      Parameters:

    • getDir

      public DirCacheTree.Directory getDir(String name)
      Get a child directory by name, returning null if the child is not a directory.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the child directory to get.
      Returns:
      The child Directory, or null if the child is not known or is not a directory.

    • map

      public <MN extends FileTree.FileTreeNode> MN map(BiFunction<DirCacheTree.Directory, List<MN>, ? extends MN> dirMapper, Function<DirCacheTree.File, ? extends MN> fileMapper)
      Map this Directory and all its children (recursively) into a different implementation of FileTree. Either of the mapping methods may return null, which will not be included in the output structure. This is the recommended approach if empty Directories are to be trimmed from the output.
      Type Parameters:
      MN - MappedNode, the subtype of FileTree.FileTreeNode used for generic nodes in the mapped tree.
      Parameters:
      dirMapper - Method for mapping a Directory and it's already mapped children to a mapped Directory.
      fileMapper - Method for mapping a File to a mapped File.
      Returns:
      The result of called dirMapper on this Directory with all of its children mapped.

    • flatten

      public <F> List<F> flatten(Function<DirCacheTree.File, F> fileMapper)
      Map all the Files in this Directory and all its children (recursively) into a List of individually mapped items.
      Type Parameters:
      F - The subtype of AbstractTree.AbstractNode used for generic nodes in the mapped tree.
      Parameters:
      fileMapper - Method for mapping a File to a mapped File.
      Returns:
      The result of called dirMapper on this Directory with all of its children mapped.
